title: Design and preparation of a novel pullulan hard capsule formulation: A promising green candidate and study of crucial capsule features
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Ramin Ramezani Kalmer, Afzal Karimi, Hamed Ramezanalizadeh, Mojgan Ghanbari, Dariush Samandarian, Atefeh Sadjadinia, Samira Gholizadeh dogaheh, Seyedehmaryam Moosavi
